title: Strictly's Johannes becomes instant icon - slays pro dance in high-heeled boots
text:
Dear everyone who wanted to know how to be more sassy and fabulous, Strictly gave a masterclass with their group routine on Sunday night’s results show.

Johannes Radebe became an internet sensation thanks to the performance, where the 32-year-old strapped on a pair of heels and strutted down the red carpet with a pose fan for their fashion-inspired routine.

Performing to Fame, Johannes gave it his all as brought some serious fabulosity in the routine, flanked by two backing dancers who acted as security guards.

Slut-dropping, a little twerking, and a hell of a lot of posing, Johannes full on snatched the centre stage from the rest of his pro performers and made sure he got the spotlight.

Kinky Boots eat your heart out.

Johannes still the show in kitten heel boots (Picture: BBC)

Slaying the dance floor, the rest of the pros weren’t far behind as they showed off the bright lights of a Vogue runway.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Even the judges got involved and gave themselves some time to look classy as hell as they donned their own fans declaring that shade was officially all around them.

Basically, it was everything, and fans online flocked to praise the amazing routine.

@jojo_radebe absolutely LOVED your pro dance! I couldn't even try to be as sexy and look as good as you in heels babe! I was screaming!!! #Strictly #StrictlyComeDancing #StrictlyComeDancing #slayqueen #livingmybestlife — Jackie Woolley (@Jackie_Woolley) October 20, 2019

Can we have a round of applause for @jojo_radebe because he OWNED that pro dance.👑 I could watch that on repeat forever.😍 #Strictly — daniella 🎃 (@daca_nella) October 20, 2019

Cannot stop rewatching that pro dance number on tonight's show. The prospect of Monday morning doesn't seem so bad now. Thank you @jojo_radebe and @bbcstrictly #Strictly #StrictlyComeDancing #Strictlyresults pic.twitter.com/6xQu6MiHUN — Fi Hamilton (@FiHamilton2) October 20, 2019

Watching @jojo_radebe live his best life and SLAY the pro dance tonight!!! 😆🥰😘 Wish I could walk in heals let alone dance… and that kick!!😮😆🥰#Strictly #StrictlyComeDancing2019 — Lady M (@skyebenson) October 20, 2019

Unfortunately not everything was put happiness as another celebrity was sent home in the fourth elimination of the series.

After three dance offs, David James was finally given his marching orders over his ‘wooden’ Jive.

His final performance came after he landed in the bottom two against Mike Bushell and Katya Jones – with all the judges voting to save them instead of David and Nadiya.

More: Strictly Come Dancing David James snaps at Claudia Winkleman as mum gets shown on Strictly Come Dancing Who left Strictly Come Dancing last night in the fourth elimination of the series? Strictly Come Dancing fans fume as David James is voted off after Dev-gate

Advertisement

Advertisement

Speaking about his journey, David admitted: ‘Oh I’ve loved it. I feel so bad I’ve let Nadiya down in a sense. I’ve enjoyed it but I’ve put some weight on though.’

When asked about his highlights, the sports star added: ‘Having the best partner and the guys up there. Everyone’s lovely.’

Nadiya also sang David’s praises, telling him: ‘He’s done so well. I’m so proud of you. From the first day he couldn’t lift his elbows up or stand straight and now he’s delivered such an amazing jive. I’m so proud.’

Strictly Come Dancing continues Saturday at 6.40pm on BBC One.

description: Strictly Come Dancing brought the runway to the dancefloor for their group performance this weekend. But Johannes Radebe stole the show.
